contentList:
Death Knight You were raised from death to be a servant of a tyrant Lich, but have broken free and now wield Runic might for your own aims. Runes You gain 3 Runes, which are restored on a Short Rest. Runeforging You gain the ability to engrave runes onto your weapons to enhance them with magical effects. Engrave a rune onto your weapon to enhance it with magical effects. Runes do not have any effect if their wielders do not have the ability to Runeforge.
Runes are more powerful when forged on Runeblades. Runeforge: Razorice Engrave your weapon(s) with a rune that adds [1] to attacks. Rune of Razorice Deals an extra [1]. Rune of Razorice II Rune of Razorice III Rune of Razorice IV Runeforge: Fallen Crusader Engrave your weapon(s) with a rune that restores [1] when you hit an enemy in combat. Rune of the Fallen Crusader Restores [1] when you hit an enemy in combat. Rune of the Fallen Crusader II Rune of the Fallen Crusader III Rune of the Fallen Crusader IV Runeforge: Stoneskin Gargoyle Engrave your weapon with a rune that gives its wielder +[1] to Strength and Constituion Saving Throws. Works only for weapons being wielded with two hands. Rune of the Stoneskin Gargoyle Wielder has +[1] to Strength and Constituion Saving Throws. Rune of the Stoneskin Gargoyle II Rune of the Stoneskin Gargoyle III Rune of the Stoneskin Gargoyle IV Runeblade When Runeforged, this weapon binds to you and becomes Magical. At 4th Death Knight level, this gains up to a +1 Enchantment, increasing to +2 at 7th level and +3 at 10th level.
These enchantments also increase the power of applied Runes. Runeblade +0 Runeblade +1 Runeblade +2 Runeblade +3 Rune Rune 1 Rune 2 Rune 3 Improved Rune Die The size of die used for most Rune Spells increases to [1]. Lichborne You are considered to be Undead. You can't be Poisoned and are immune to many mind altering spells, but can't be healed by many traditional healing spells. Rune Casting Your Runes refresh on a Short Rest. Rune Spells Choose the spells you know from the list below. Spells require Runes to cast to cast, unless a feature states otherwise. Rune Tap Convert 2 of one Rune into 1 of another Rune. Rune Tap: Blood Create 1 Blood Rune. Rune Tap: Frost Create 1 Frost Rune. Rune Tap: Unholy Create 1 Unholy Rune. This bonus increases to 2 at Level 8 and to 3 at Level 12. Will of the Necropolis You have Advantage on Concentration and Death Saving Throws. Empower Rune Weapon When attacking with a Runeforged weapon, you deal an additional [1]. Rune Mastery You gain power that rivals even that of the Lich that turned you. Choose one of the following Passive Features. Frost You are an icy harbinger of doom, channeling runic power and delivering vicious weapon strikes. Frost Rune You gain a Frost Rune. These are restored on a Short Rest. Frozen Heart You add your Proficiency Bonus to the Cold damage of your spells and Rune abilities. Frost Strike Chill your weapon with icy power and strike an enemy for a bonus [1] and slow their movement speed by [2] for 2 turns. Obliterate A brutal attack that deals a bonus [1]. Obliterate (Dual Wielding) A brutal attack with both weapons that deals a bonus [1]. Howling Blast Blast the target with a frigid wind, dealing [1] and inflicting targets with Frost Fever. Frost Fever Movement speed reduced by [1]. Takes [2] per turn. Frostscythe A sweeping attack that strikes up to 3 enemies in front of you for an additional [1]. On a critical hits, the bonus Cold damage dealt is additionally doubled. Rime Once per turn, when you land a Critical Hit on a creature, your next Howling Blast has no resource cost. Your next Howling Blast has no resource cost. Killing Machine Your next Obliterate or Frostscythe will be a guaranteed Critical Hit. Obliteration Once per turn, when you hit a creature with Obliterate, refund 1 Frost Rune. If it's a Critical Hit, refund 2. Chains of Ice Shackles the target with frozen chains, dealing [1] and possibly restraining them. Path of Frost Grant a target immunity to the effects of ice surfaces. You are immune to the effects of ice surfaces. Mind Freeze Break a target's Concentration and possibly prevent them from casting spells for [1] turns. Can't speak or cast spells with a verbal component. Blood You are a dark guardian who manipulates and corrupts life energy to sustain yourself in the face of an enemy onslaught. Blood Rune You gain a Blood Rune. These are restored on a Short Rest. Blood Shield While you have temporary hit points, all Bludgeoning, Piercing and Slashing damage you take is reduced by your Proficiency Bonus. Death Strike A deadly strike that deals an extra [1] and heals you for [2]. If you already have full hit points, gain [3] temporary hit points instead. Sacrificial Pact Destroy a summoned Undead ally to recover half your hit points. Heart Strike Strike the target with a bonus [1]. If you're within Death and Decay, also deal [2] to all enemies within [3]. Blood Boil Deal [1] to nearby enemies and inflict them with Blood Plague. Blood Plague Draining [1] per turn. Has Disadvantage on Attack Rolls against targets other than the Death Knight. Marrowrend Smash the target, dealing an extra [1] and gaining [2] temporary hit points. Bone Shield Dark Succor Whenever you kill an enemy, your next successful Death Strike will refund the spent Blood Rune. Crimson Scourge Dark Succor also makes your next Death and Decay consume no Runes, or your next Death and Decay Recast consume no resources. Carnage While you have temporary hit points, you can cast Rune spells as a Bonus Action. Unholy You are a master of death and decay, spreading infection and controlling undead minions to do your bidding. Unholy Rune You gain an Unholy Rune. These are restored on a Short Rest. Dreadblade Your summons deal additional Necrotic damage equal to your Proficiency Bonus.
If you have no summons near you, this bonus instead increases the Necrotic damage of your spells and Rune abilities. Deals an extra [1]. Death Coil Release a blast of unholy energy, causing [1] to an enemy target or restoring [2] to an allied Undead target. Festering Strike Strikes for an extra [1] and infects the target with a Festering Wound for [2] turns. When the wound expires, they take a further [3]. Festering Wound Disadvantage on Constitution Saving Throws. On removal, takes [1]. Further attacks from the Death Knight hasten removal by 1 turn. Outbreak Deal [1] to the target and infect it and nearby enemies with Virulent Plague. Virulent Plague Takes [1] per turn. On death, deal [1] to creatures within [2] and possibly infect them with Virulent Plague. Scourge Strike An unholy strike that deals an extra [1], plus an additional [1] for each Disease applied to the target. Sudden Doom When an enemy dies while infected with Virulent Plague, your next Death Coil costs a Bonus Action and no Runes. Your next Death Coil costs a Bonus Action and no Runes. Improved Death Coil Death Coil can target an additional creature. Superstrain When you apply Virulent Plague, also apply Frost Fever and Blood Plague for [1] turns. Anti-Magic Shell Become Resistant to all damage that is not Bludgeoning, Piercing or Slashing. You are Resistant to all damage that is not Bludgeoning, Piercing or Slashing. Dark Transformation Destroy a summoned Undead ally to transform it into a stronger one. Dark Transformation: Ghoul Transform a Zombie into a Ghoul. Dark Transformation: Flying Ghoul Transform a Skeleton into a Flying Ghoul. Dark Transformation: Mummy Transform a Ghoul or Flying Ghoul into a Mummy. Zombie Skeleton Ghoul Flying Ghoul Mummy Death Grip Harnesses the energy that surrounds and binds all matter, drawing a target toward a position of your choice within [1] of you. The DC of this Spell is equal to your total Strength Ability Score. Death and Decay Corrupts the targeted ground for [1] turns; it damages enemies for [2] per turn and becomes Difficult Terrain for them. Corrupted ground that damages enemies only for [1] per turn and becomes Difficult Terrain for them. Shift your corrupted ground. It deals [2] per turn and causes Difficult Terrain. You can recast this spell using a Bonus Action to shift your corrupted ground. Taking [1] each turn. Death's Advance Double your movement speed. Your movement speed can't be reduced by Difficult Terrain, spells, or magical effects. You can't be moved against your will. Your movement speed can't be reduced by Difficult Terrain, spells, or magical effects. You can't be moved against your will. Anti-Magic Zone Create a barrier that makes creatures inside Resistant to all damage that is not Bludgeoning, Piercing or Slashing. Does not consume any Runes. Targets still take half damage and lower status duration. Can't have Rune Weapon Must have Rune Weapon Blood or Frost Rune Blood or Unholy Rune Frost or Unhole Rune Any Rune Acherus Knight's Mail The Ebon steel of the armor glints darkly, illuminated as if by a midnight sun. Acherus Knight's Greaves The Ebon steel of the boots is heavy but secure; you could crush a skull beneath your feet and barely feel a thing. Acherus Knight's Gauntlets The Ebon steel of the gloves is sturdy and seamless, insulating the wielder's hands from the atrocities they're meant to commit with them. Runed Soulblade The Ebon steel that derives this blade hums ever so slightly, itching for magic to be engraved upon it. Armor of Arthas Abomination Limb Scourge Evenly Matched Dark Comand Gloom Ward {{- range $command, $handle := $.DK.Commands}} Dark Command: {{$command}} {{- end}} Works on Undead. Enfeeble Subduing Grasp: Person Raise Ally Raise Dead Raise Dead: Skeleton(s) Create [1] skeleton(s) that specialise in ranged combat. Raise Dead: Zombie(s) Create [1] zombie(s) that specialise in melee combat. Dancing Rune Weapon Dancing Rune Weapon: Greataxe Dancing Rune Weapon: Greatsowrd Dancing Rune Weapon: Halberd Dancing Rune Weapon: Maul Dancing Rune Weapon: Spear Dancing Rune Weapon: Trident Unholy Aura Absolute Zero San'layn Touch For 10 turns, you can use San'layn Touch again without expending any additional Runes. Avalanche Defile Raise Gargoyle Breath of Sindragosa Army of the Dead Subduing Grasp: Monster Glacial Advance Apocalypse Commander of the Dead Bloodshot While Concentrating, you may cast Bloodshot without expending any Runes. Bloodshot: Asleep Bloodshot: Panicked Bloodshot: Sickened Frostmourne Whomsoever takes up this blade shall wield power eternal. Just as the blade rends flesh, so must power scar the spirit. Power Eternal As you kill enemies with this blade, Frostmourne consume their souls to grow in power. You can reanimate these souls as Undead servants. Rend Flesh Unleash the might of the frozen wastes in an area in front of you Scar the Spirit You take [1] when attacking with this weapon, unless you are Undead. All Must Serve Raise a soul that was consumed by Frostmourne as an Undead servant. Summons either a Zombie, Ghoul, or Mummy depending on the level of the soul. Frostmourne Hungers Frostmourne deals an additional [1]. Whenever you kill an enemy with Frostmourne, roll [2]. If you get a [3], then Frostmourne grows in power to [4]. Frostmourne can grow this way up to [5]. Frostmourne deals an additional [1]. Frostmourne Soul This soul can be raised by the wielder of Frostmourne to summon a [1]. Frostmourne Soul: Pitiful Frostmourne Soul: Meager Frostmourne Soul: Acceptable Must have been killed by Frostmourne.
